attributes.action: Make social workers more accountable for their failings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that social workers should be held responsible for failing to protect children, who are already on an at risk register.  They should face a criminal prosecution and lose their job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
